categories: Category:Imperial Navy personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Tanij was a Human male who served as a captain and pilot in the Imperial Navy of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. He was stationed on Vaiken Spacedock, where he sold speeder bikes and other repulsorcraft to agents of the Empire.
Captain Tanij first appeared in the 2011 massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Speeder Vendor aboard Vaiken Spacedock.
